tool_description: Giving meaning to each playing poker cards
title: Poker Cards Cartomancy

api_list.name: Get one card
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://poker-cards-cartomancy.p.rapidapi.com/api/poker/card"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "poker-cards-cartomancy.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cards
api_list.description: All cards name, number, meaning and images
api_list.code:
import requests
